short_summary: Two (2) watercrafts and one (1) double trailer
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the purchase of two (2) fiberglass (FRP), jet powered personal watercraft (PWC) with one (1) trailer to carry both safely. Each will be supporting Policing operations including Patrol and Search and Rescue (SAR) covering extensive areas on the St. Lawrence River from the Ontario border, Quebec side to Gaspe.
